allBlogs.title: How to learn flutter
allBlogs.content: Flutter is an open-source UI software development toolkit by Google, used to build natively compiled applications for mobile (iOS, Android), web, and desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux) from a single codebase. It uses the Dart programming language and is known for its fast development, expressive UI, and strong performance.
allBlogs.author: Vinayak Jaimini

allBlogs.title: How to learn javascript
allBlogs.content: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, and versatile programming language primarily used for creating interactive and dynamic web applications. Itâ€™s one of the core technologies of the web, alongside HTML and CSS.
allBlogs.author: Vinayak Jaimini

allBlogs.title: Learning Sketching
allBlogs.content: Sketching is a form of drawing that focuses on quickly capturing the essence or basic form of a subject, often without worrying about perfect details. It is both an art form and a practical skill used in various fields like design, engineering, and visual storytelling.
allBlogs.author: vinayak
